com.yahoo.labs.samoa.learners.classifiers

Class NaiveBayes

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.labs.samoa.learners.classifiers.NaiveBayes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocalLearner, Serializable

    public class NaiveBayes
extends Object
implements LocalLearner
    Implementation of a non-distributed Naive Bayes classifier. At the moment, the implementation models all attributes as numeric attributes.
    Author:
    Olivier Van Laere (vanlaere yahoo-inc dot com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getVotesForInstance

        public double[] getVotesForInstance(Instance inst)
        Predicts the class memberships for a given instance. If an instance is unclassified, the returned array elements will be all zero. Smoothing is being implemented by the AttributeClassObserver classes. At the moment, the GaussianNumericProbabilityAttributeClassObserver needs no smoothing as it processes continuous variables. Please note that we transform the scores to log space to avoid underflow, and we replace the multiplication with addition. The resulting scores are no longer probabilities, as a mixture of probability densities and probabilities can be used in the computation.
        Specified by:
        getVotesForInstance in interface LocalLearner
        Parameters:
        inst - the instance to be classified
        Returns:
        an array containing the estimated membership scores of the test instance in each class, in log space.

      • resetLearning

        public void resetLearning()
        Resets this classifier. It must be similar to starting a new classifier from scratch.
        Specified by:
        resetLearning in interface LocalLearner

      • trainOnInstance
